text.1: Do you enjoy solving difficult problems? Are you resourceful? Do you enjoy working with data? Can you code? If so, AmTrust is looking to add another talented Data Scientist to their growing Advanced Analytics Team. AmTrust Financial Services Inc. is a multinational property and casualty insurer specializing in coverage for small to mid-sized businesses. We love finding new and innovative ways to use our data and technology to provide a top-notch customer experience and we want your help!
text.2: As a Data Scientist, you will unveil insights in our data that will allow us to improve the decision-making process both at an operational and strategic level. You will use the latest machine learning algorithms to develop predictive models to help us assess risks more accurately, handle claims more effectively, and understand and serve our customers more thoroughly.
text.3: Qualified applicants would preferably have 2+ years=E2=80=99 experience in the following skill areas:

li.1: Machine learning algorithms (i.e. GLM, Boosting, Deep Learning, etc...)
li.2: Model performance measures and validation techniques (i.e. K-fold cross-validation, train/test split, etc...)
li.3: SQL and relational databases (both transactional and analytical environments)
li.5: Collaborative development and version control systems (i.e. Git)
li.6: Unix-like operating systems and comfort in the shell environment (i.e. Bash)

li: Deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow or PyTorch and associated high-level API=E2=80=99s like Keras
li.3: Web-application development (Javascript, Node, Flask, Shiny, etc.)
li.5: Strong performance in a Kaggle competition (top 10%)
li.6: Significant contributions to an open-source project

text.4: AmTrust Financial Services offers a competitive compensation package and excellent career advancement opportunities. Our benefits include: Medical & Dental Plans, Life Insurance, including eligible spouses & children, Health Care Flexible Spending, Dependent Care, 401k Savings Plans, Paid Time Off.
text.5: AmTrust strives to create a diverse and inclusive culture where thoughts and ideas of all employees are appreciated and respected. This concept encompasses but is not limited to human differences with regard to race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, culture, religion or disabilities.
text.6: AmTrust values excellence and recognizes that by embracing the diverse backgrounds, skills, and perspectives of its workforce, it will sustain a competitive advantage and remain an employer of choice. Diversity is a business imperative, enabling us to attract, retain and develop the best talent available. We see diversity as more than just policies and practices. It is an integral part of who we are as a company, how we operate and how we see our future.
